resources.string: Please install Gear Manager or Gear Fit Manager and Remote Sensor Service first. After that update / reinstall your application.
Please install Remote Sensor Service first. After that update / reinstall your application.
There is no permission to access the Remote Sensor Service. Please update / reinstall your application.
There is no permission to access the Gear Manager or Gear Fit Manager. Please update/reinstall the Remote Sensor Service.
